thread.title: EA community chief tweets #Skate4, internet loses its mind
thread.title_full: EA community chief tweets #Skate4, internet loses its mind

title: EA community chief tweets #Skate4, internet loses its mind
text:
EA community chief tweets #Skate4, internet loses its mind Half-pipe dream?   
Over the weekend, EA community manager Daniel Lingen tweeted #Skate4, and the internet lost its collective mind. 
The bare-bones tease was enough to spark a whopping 20,000 likes and 10,000 RTs on the social network, showing internet demand for another game in EA's silly skating series is as strong as ever. â€” Daniel Lingen (@HuskyHog) January 28, 2017 
Here are a few of the excited reactions:
